## Permits
The data collection efforts referenced here have been conducted under a series of MMPA/ESA Reseach/Enhancement permits issued to SWFSC. Specific information for more recent permits (since circa 1990), as well as additional historic permits issued to SWFSC, are available from the NOAA Fisheries [Authorizations and Permits for Protected Species (APPS) database](https://apps.nmfs.noaa.gov/search/search.cfm).
